title: lateinit property closeable has not been initialized
body:
### Description

Just got this crash with leakcanary when running the monkey runner:
```
02-29 02:33:48.014  5957  5957 D LeakCanary: Watching instance of androidx.lifecycle.ReportFragment (androidx.lifecycle.ReportFragment received Fragment#onDestroy() callback) with key 56130f06-4d14-49e8-98ce-44f1980746df
02-29 02:33:48.019  5957  5957 D LeakCanary: Watching instance of leakcanary.internal.activity.LeakActivity (leakcanary.internal.activity.LeakActivity received Activity#onDestroy() callback) with key 01432aa7-5d6e-4f89-b511-2c30d656aa07
02-29 02:33:48.027  5957  5985 D OpenGLRenderer: endAllActiveAnimators on 0x9785ed80 (StateListDrawable) with handle 0x85d1c580
02-29 02:33:48.027  5957  5985 D OpenGLRenderer: endAllActiveAnimators on 0x9785d880 (StateListDrawable) with handle 0x853095f0
02-29 02:33:48.027  5957  5985 D OpenGLRenderer: endAllActiveAnimators on 0x86e74a00 (LinearLayout) with handle 0x853628b0
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: pool-2-thread-1
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: Process: org.ligi.passandroid, PID: 5957
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: kotlin.UninitializedPropertyAccessException: lateinit property closeable has not been initialized
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.screen.HprofExplorerScreen$createView$1$1$onViewDetachedFromWindow$1.invoke(HprofExplorerScreen.kt:62)
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.screen.HprofExplorerScreen$createView$1$1$onViewDetachedFromWindow$1.invoke(HprofExplorerScreen.kt:56)
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at leakcanary.internal.activity.db.IoKt$sam$java_lang_Runnable$0.run(Unknown Source:2)
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1162)
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:636)
02-29 02:33:48.064  5957  6013 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:764)
```

### Version Information

* LeakCanary version: 2.2
* Android OS version: 26
